Name: Gromopoli
About the game: 'Gromopoli' is an online board game centered around the ownership of properties: Buy as many properties as you can to get closer to victory and make your enemies go bankrupt, play with a total of 8 players in a chaotic land ownership war, fight with teams going from 4 team of 2 players to 2 teams of 4 players! Enjoy the various board skins and chose to play on varying board sizes for shorter or longer games!
